title: Pink Floyd - The Wall (1979) 1994 UK Remastered (FLAC-EAC-CUE)
description:
Pink Floyd - The Wall (1979) 1994 UK Remastered (FLAC-EAC-CUE)







CD Pressing Information




Label:	EMI Records
Catalog#:	7243 8 31243 2 9, CDEMD 1071
Format:	2 x CD, Album, Remastered
Country:	Europe
Released:	10 Oct 1994
Genre:	Rock
Style:	Psychedelic Rock, Prog Rock, Symphonic Rock



Credits:	

Arranged By [Orchestra] - Michael Kamen
Backing Vocals - Bruce Johnston , Islington Green School , 
Jim Haas , Joe Chemay , John Joyce , Stan Farber , Toni Tennille
Co-producer, Engineer - James Guthrie
Engineer - Brian Christian , John McClure , Nick Griffiths , 
Patrice Quef , Rick Hart
Mastered By - Doug Sax
Mastered By [Remaster] - Doug Sax
Producer - David Gilmour , Roger Waters
Producer, Arranged By [Orchestra] - Bob Ezrin
Written-By - Roger Waters



Notes:	

Originally released in 1979.

Sound equipment: Phil Taylor.
Re-mastering supervised by James Guthrie.
Mastered at The Mastering Lab (Los Angeles, CA, USA).
Recorded at Superbear (Miravel, France), 
Producers Workshop (Los Angeles, CA, USA) & C.B.S. (New York, NY, USA) 
between April and November 1979.
